summary: The film follows Nicole Carrow, a young woman who is threatened by a maniac serial killer, after her boyfriend Jess, is abducted in a rest stop.
cast: Jaimie Alexander|Joseph George Mendicino|Deanna Russo|Diane Salinger|Michael Childers|Curtis Taylor|Joey Lawrence|Gary Entin|Edmund Entin|Jennifer Cormack|Mikey Post|Nick Orefice
title: Área de descanso
